element.name: Feature: Never Unarmed
element.source: Fester's List of Monsters and Races

description.p: Your time in the slammer has taught you a great many things. One of the most valuable is how to remain armed. You can hide a dagger on your person in such a way to where it is difficult to be found, those searching you for it roll investigation at disadvantage vs your deception.
Additionally with just some basic materials and a hour of work you can craft yourself a shiv. Stats identical to dagger without the thrown property.
